text: Was always very nervous about visiting a dentist. Was attended by Dr Nadya Neo & the experience was so good. She is very gentle and careful during the process. I had very sensitive teeth and Dr Nadya is very attentive, ensuring that i am ok during the cleaning process. She will be my regular dentist going forward.

It's official,I made the right choice by going to Dr Soh.I love how compassionate she is and making sure I'm comfortable every appointment.Grateful that she didn't give up on me and always have this positive vibe. I highly recommend her to those that fear going to the dentist.Trust me,she's gentle. And all her assistants is friendly and helpful.I love my dentist üòÑ

Had an excellent experience. Dr. Nadya is so thorough and informative, She took the time to explain the details of my tooth condition and my treatment plan. Lets you know every step of the way what‚Äôs going on so there are no surprises. Very calming, as well. Highly recommends

Doctor Nadya was gentle, patience and detailed with her consultation. She advised me on the pros and cons of my tooth extraction procedure, she did not rush me to make decision. She was professional and managed to extract my modular tooth through regular extraction instead of the complication surgery process. The front desk lady (Alexis) was also approachable, friendly and kind. Overall, I had an wonderful and pleasurable experience with Teeth Q. I had decided to switch over to consult Teeth Q instead of my previous dental who had charged me double of the price with painful extraction.
Happy Customer.
Pleasant first-time experience to do cleaning & polishing. A comforting doctor (Dr. Soh May Leng) and staffs. See you in 6 months time. üëçüèº
